fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, International co-operation and development, Customs, Business and Industry, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Trans-European Networks
head_office_address: 19th Floor, Philippine AXA Life Centre Sen. Gil Puyat Ave., cor. Tindalo St.
eu_initiatives:
European Economic Diplomacy 
EU-Generalised Scheme of Preferences + 
EU Free Trade Agreements 
EU Development Aid programs
organisation_name: European Chamber of Commerce of the Philippines (ECCP)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The ECCP is a bilateral foreign chamber that promotes European interests in the Philippines and vice versa. With nearly 800 members, the ECCP offers a strong business network that holds great potential in translating to tangible business opportunities. It is a unique organisation that offers membership as well as professional business services to members and clients.
relevant_communication: ECCP is together with partners in the Philippines implementing EU (co) funded projects which aim to boost trade and business relations between the Philippines and the EU.
